00164             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00165             {
00166                   try
00167                   {
00168                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'paginator3000' ) ; )
00169                         {
00170                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00171                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'paginator3000.tpl' );
00172                               $PlaceHolders = array( 
00173                                     '{id}' , '{page_count}' , '{visible_page_count}' , '{current_page}' , '{page_url}'
00174                               );
00175                               $Values = array(
00176                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) ) , 
00177                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'page_count' ) , 
00178                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'visible_page_count' , 10 ) , 
00179                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'current_page' , 1 ) , 
00180                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'page_url' )
00181                               );
00182                               $Template = str_replace( $PlaceHolders , $Values , $Template );
00183                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( 
00184                                     "{paginator3000:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $ProcessingString
00185                               );
00186                               $Changed = true;
00187                         }
00188                         return( $ProcessingString );
00189                   }
00190                   catch( Exception $e )
00191                   {
00192                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00193                   }
00194             }
00195       }
